body:
Hi guys, no we [haven't](https://github.com/mcneel/ghpython/blob/master/Component/ScriptingAncestorComponent.cs#L821). It's there [since 4 months](https://github.com/mcneel/ghpython/commit/38cf73f921a436c0f27fd870ea7ab0d706d202e9#diff-6170819c68eff86724d798cf313b4a76R669) (but not forever, and we are not planning to remove it any time soon). In general, it is automatically assigned if you set the Help (or Remarks) keyword [in the docstring help](https://github.com/mcneel/ghpython/blob/master/Component/DocStringUtils.cs#L23) in the component. @Saeran: What version of GhPython are you using? I think it is an older version.

@Mostapha: Why are you assigning "2" to AdditionalHelpFromDocStrings? This property is just a way to easily show a small remark at the end of the help file. But it would be better to just use the docstring help key for it. It's not a mistake to set it, though. Thanks, Giulio -- Giulio Piacentino
for Robert McNeel & Associates
giulio@mcneel.com
